body:
Great news that the download cache has been merged.  However... I can't find documentation for it!  Key questions need to be addressed include:
1. How do you turn this feature on/off?
2. Where is the cache located?
3. What do tarballs look like in the cache?
4. Anything else regarding special cases, etc?

Hopefully this shouldn't be much.  @scheibelp can you please add docs to the Spack user manual and submit in a new PR?  That will ensure that people are able to make use of all the work that went into this feature.  Thanks!
title: Documentation for: Features/cache archives #579
